Articles.Content:
Not sure if it is already posted,but i'm using a corsair K55 French AZERTY keyboard,i used the change layout function to switch all my keys instantly to that perfect layout (very handy feature!) 

problem is it still thinks its a QWERTY keyboard,i tried changing them manually too but nope   ZSQD stays WASD ...

Please help...

Is the keyboard layout set to azerty (french) in windows aswell? 

Might be a conflicting keyboard layout id...

33 minutes ago, MK3424 said:

Is the keyboard layout set to azerty (french) in windows aswell? 

Might be a conflicting keyboard layout id...

I have indeed made sure its in french azerty aswell,it even gets detected like that in kerbal space program
